infest.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if insects, rats etc infest a place, there are a lot of them and they usually cause damage
infest.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The kitchen was infested with cockroaches.
infest.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if a place is infested with things or people you do not want, there are too many of them there
infest.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: an area infested with holiday homes
